ALUMNI
You're off campus and on your career path. But you can still be the difference in the Bren School community, no matter if you've moved down the block, across the country or around the world, find out how »
FRIENDS
Friend's participation, whether in the form of service like mentoring and student recruitment or in the form of donations, such as equipment, are all vital to our mutual success, find out why »
EGIVING
Thanks to the generous giving of alumni, friends, corporations and foundations, the Bren School has built a reputation for excellence benefiting its students, its faculty and the community at large. Demonstrate your commitment to the Bren School by making your gift today.
